carpet.rule.comparatorGetsRealTime.name: Comparator Retrieves UTC Time
carpet.rule.comparatorGetsRealTime.desc: When enabled, comparators can obtain hexadecimal digits (corresponding to seconds) of UTC time from clock-containing item frames, determined by the clock's rotation angle
carpet.rule.comparatorGetsRealTimeHigh32: Comparator Retrieves UTC Time High 32-bit Block
When UTC time retrieval is enabled, comparators will obtain corresponding hexadecimal digits from the high 32 bits of UTC time when detecting clock item frames through this specific block type
carpet.rule.relimitedEnchantments.name: Relimited enchantments
carpet.rule.relimitedEnchantments.desc: Reset max level of chosen enchantments
carpet.rule.disableAnvilPunishment.name: Disable anvil punishment
carpet.rule.fakePlayerExperienceDuplicat: Fixes the issue where Carpet mod's fake players do not clear experience points upon death. This rule addresses the experience duplication exploit.
carpet.rule.survivalAnvilLimit.name: Survival Anvil Limit
carpet.rule.survivalAnvilLimit.desc: Modify anvil "Too Expensive" limit in survival, set as negative value to unlock all limit
carpet.rule.modifyUnbreakingFunction.des: Modify Unbreaking enchantment function magnification from "n + 1" to "n + 1 + n(n-1)(n-2)(n-3) / 24"
